name: Mailjet Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Mailjet Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Mailjet events via webhooks

event.name: event
event.description: Determines which resource events the webhook is triggered for
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 作用: Determines which resource events the webhook is triggered for | 默认值: open | (必填项)
